title: Sci-Fi Action Thriller 'Primal Games' Trailer with Hannaj Bang Bendz
description: "I decide who lives and who dies!" You do? Uncork'd Entertainment has revealed an official trailer for a sci-fi action thriller movie called Primal Games, being dumped on VOD this May in a few weeks. The entirely uninteresting title is already an indication this won't be worth your time - and the trailer below will confirm that. "Primal Games is a relentless, high-concept survival thriller with strong performances, brutal action, and a unique edge." A newlywed couple heads on the honeymoon of their dreams, only to become unwitting participants in a sadistic vacation experience. Trapped in a deadly game designed for the thrill-seeking elite, they must fight for survival and uncover the shocking truth about their existence before it's too late. In a world where nothing is as it seems, primal instincts are their only hope. It's a generic action movie with a sci-fi twist, I guess, though it just reminds me of Ready or Not. Primal Games stars Hannaj Bang Bendz, John Love, and Gary Kasper, featuring practical stunts, martial arts action, and high-intensity set pieces. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for David Ryan Keith's film Primal Games, direct from YouTube: From the producers of Army of One, […]
author: Alex Billington

text: TRAILERS by April 28, 2025Source: YouTube "I decide who lives and who dies!" You do? Uncork'd Entertainment has revealed an official trailer for a sci-fi action thriller movie called Primal Games, being dumped on VOD this May in a few weeks. The entirely uninteresting title is already an indication this won't be worth your time - and the trailer below will confirm that. "Primal Games is a relentless, high-concept survival thriller with strong performances, brutal action, and a unique edge." A newlywed couple heads on the honeymoon of their dreams, only to become unwitting participants in a sadistic vacation experience. Trapped in a deadly game designed for the thrill-seeking elite, they must fight for survival and uncover the shocking truth about their existence before it's too late. In a world where nothing is as it seems, primal instincts are their only hope. It's a generic action movie with a sci-fi twist, I guess, though it just reminds me of Ready or Not. Primal Games stars Hannaj Bang Bendz, John Love, and Gary Kasper, featuring practical stunts, martial arts action, and high-intensity set pieces. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for David Ryan Keith's film Primal Games, direct from YouTube: From the producers of Army of One, Primal Games follows a newlywed couple whose honeymoon turns into a waking nightmare when they are thrust into a sadistic survival game created for the world’s thrill-seeking elite. Hunted and outnumbered, they must fight to survive and uncover the truth about the twisted reality they’ve been dragged into. Primal Games is written and directed by American indie genre filmmaker David Ryan Keith, director of the horror films Attack of the Herbals, The Redwood Massacre & Redwood Massacre: Annihilation, Ghosts of Darkness, The Dark Within, and I Am Rage previously. It's produced by Mary Ann Barnes, David Dittlinger, and Lorraine Keith. Uncork'd Ent. will release David Ryan Keith's film Primal Games movie direct-to-VOD starting on May 6th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone want to watch this? Find more posts in: Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
April 28, 2025
Source: YouTube

"I decide who lives and who dies!" You do? Uncork'd Entertainment has revealed an official trailer for a sci-fi action thriller movie called Primal Games, being dumped on VOD this May in a few weeks. The entirely uninteresting title is already an indication this won't be worth your time - and the trailer below will confirm that. "Primal Games is a relentless, high-concept survival thriller with strong performances, brutal action, and a unique edge." A newlywed couple heads on the honeymoon of their dreams, only to become unwitting participants in a sadistic vacation experience. Trapped in a deadly game designed for the thrill-seeking elite, they must fight for survival and uncover the shocking truth about their existence before it's too late. In a world where nothing is as it seems, primal instincts are their only hope. It's a generic action movie with a sci-fi twist, I guess, though it just reminds me of Ready or Not. Primal Games stars Hannaj Bang Bendz, John Love, and Gary Kasper, featuring practical stunts, martial arts action, and high-intensity set pieces.

Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for David Ryan Keith's film Primal Games, direct from YouTube:

From the producers of Army of One, Primal Games follows a newlywed couple whose honeymoon turns into a waking nightmare when they are thrust into a sadistic survival game created for the world’s thrill-seeking elite. Hunted and outnumbered, they must fight to survive and uncover the truth about the twisted reality they’ve been dragged into. Primal Games is written and directed by American indie genre filmmaker David Ryan Keith, director of the horror films Attack of the Herbals, The Redwood Massacre & Redwood Massacre: Annihilation, Ghosts of Darkness, The Dark Within, and I Am Rage previously. It's produced by Mary Ann Barnes, David Dittlinger, and Lorraine Keith. Uncork'd Ent. will release David Ryan Keith's film Primal Games movie direct-to-VOD starting on May 6th, 2025 coming soon. Anyone want to watch this?

Find more posts in: Sci-Fi, To Watch, Trailer
